SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.entity.Exam

Class Submission

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Entity
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Exam.Submission
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Entity>
public class Submission extends Entity
Represents a submission of an exam by a student. This class handles the answers provided by the student, calculates scores, and manages question data.
See Also:

      Parameters:

      score - The new score to set.
      Throws:
